parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud partner (a certified ISV) or individual user.

parameters.name: Permission
parameters.description:
The permission on the ENI. Valid values:

InstanceAttach: the permission to attach the ENI to an ECS instance. The ENI and the ECS instance must be in the same zone.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ENI. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
